channel.title: Révision :: 420-SN1-RE
channel.description: Exercice 1 : Neutralisation acide-base import matplotlib.pyplot as plt volumes = [] ph_values = [] v = 0 while True: p = 3 + 4 * (1 - 2.718**(-0.8 * v)) #p = ph(v) volumes.append(v) ph_values.append(p) print(f"Volume = {v:.1f} mL --> pH = {p:.2f}") if 6.8 <= p <= 7.2: break v += 0.5 plt.plot(volumes, ph_values, marker='o') plt.xlabel("Volume de base (mL)") plt.ylabel("pH") plt.title("Titrage acide-base") plt.grid(True) plt.show() Exercice 2 : Désintégration radioactive import numpy as np import matplotlib.
